languages.text: "Воины Империума, Бог-Император взирает на нас, здесь и сейчас. Я готов{mf||а} столкнуться со смертью лицом к лицу, ибо Он хранит меня. Готовы ли и вы не посрамить себя перед Его взором?"

traits.locale_text: "Воины Империума, Бог-Император взирает на нас, здесь и сейчас. Я готов{mf||а} столкнуться со смертью лицом к лицу, ибо Он хранит меня. Готовы ли и вы не посрамить себя перед Его взором?"

languages.text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"
languages.original_text: "Воины Империума, Бог-Император взирает на нас, здесь и сейчас. Я готов{mf||а} столкнуться со смертью лицом к лицу, ибо Он хранит меня. Готовы ли и вы не посрамить себя перед Его взором?"

traits.locale_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

"Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

"Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

"Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

"Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

"Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

languages.text: 「帝国の戦士たち！いつ、どこにいても、神帝陛下が我々を見守っていて下さる。{mf|俺|私}はそれを知っているから、死に直面する覚悟ができている。お前たちはどうだ？主の目の前で自身を辱めるのか？それとも戦って勝つのか？」
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の戦士たち！いつ、どこにいても、神帝陛下が我々を見守っていて下さる。{mf|俺|私}はそれを知っているから、死に直面する覚悟ができている。お前たちはどうだ？主の目の前で自身を辱めるのか？それとも戦って勝つのか？」

languages.text: “帝国的勇士们啊！此时此刻，神皇的目光正注视着我们。我已经准备好面对死亡了，因为我知道祂正在看着我。你们呢？你们是打算在祂的注视下自甘堕落？还是说，你们打算奋起抗争，获得胜利？”
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: “帝国的勇士们啊！此时此刻，神皇的目光正注视着我们。我已经准备好面对死亡了，因为我知道祂正在看着我。你们呢？你们是打算在祂的注视下自甘堕落？还是说，你们打算奋起抗争，获得胜利？”

languages.text: «¡Guerreros del Imperium! La mirada del Dios Emperador está sobre nosotros, aquí y ahora. Yo estoy {mf|preparado|preparada} para encontrarme cara a cara con mi muerte, pues sé que él me vigila. ¿Y ustedes? ¿Se deshonrarán ante sus ojos? ¿O lucharán y triunfarán?».
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Guerreros del Imperium! La mirada del Dios Emperador está sobre nosotros, aquí y ahora. Yo estoy {mf|preparado|preparada} para encontrarme cara a cara con mi muerte, pues sé que él me vigila. ¿Y ustedes? ¿Se deshonrarán ante sus ojos? ¿O lucharán y triunfarán?».

languages.text: "Krieger des Imperiums! Der Gottimperator blickt auf uns, hier und jetzt. Ich bin bereit, meinem Tod ins Gesicht zu sehen, denn ich weiß, dass er über mich wacht. Was ist mit Euch? Werdet Ihr Euch in seinen Augen entehren? Oder werdet Ihr kämpfen und siegen?"
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: "Krieger des Imperiums! Der Gottimperator blickt auf uns, hier und jetzt. Ich bin bereit, meinem Tod ins Gesicht zu sehen, denn ich weiß, dass er über mich wacht. Was ist mit Euch? Werdet Ihr Euch in seinen Augen entehren? Oder werdet Ihr kämpfen und siegen?"

languages.text: « Guerriers de l'Imperium ! L'Empereur-Dieu a les yeux rivés sur nous, ici et maintenant. Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à affronter la mort, car je sais qu'Il veille sur moi. Et vous ? Allez-vous vous déshonorer alors qu'Il vous regarde ? Ou allez-vous combattre, et mieux encore, triompher ? »
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: « Guerriers de l'Imperium ! L'Empereur-Dieu a les yeux rivés sur nous, ici et maintenant. Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à affronter la mort, car je sais qu'Il veille sur moi. Et vous ? Allez-vous vous déshonorer alors qu'Il vous regarde ? Ou allez-vous combattre, et mieux encore, triompher ? »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un savaşçıları! Tanrı İmparator'un gözü üzerimizde. Ölümle yüzleşmeye hazırım zira İmparator'un beni kolladığını biliyorum. Peki ya sizler? Savaşıp galip gelecek misiniz? Yoksa İmparator'un gözünden mi düşeceksiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Warriors of the Imperium! The God-Emperor's gaze is upon us, here and now. I am ready to meet my death face to face, for I know that He watches over me. What about you? Will you disgrace yourselves in His eyes? Or will you fight and prevail?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un savaşçıları! Tanrı İmparator'un gözü üzerimizde. Ölümle yüzleşmeye hazırım zira İmparator'un beni kolladığını biliyorum. Peki ya sizler? Savaşıp galip gelecek misiniz? Yoksa İmparator'un gözünden mi düşeceksiniz?"
